page.title: 14RECREATION IN DELABOLE
page.content:
{Clubs for children.
There are 3 clubs for children in Delabole and 5 in Camelford.In Delabole there are the Y.O.C.,Brownies and the Youth Club.In Camelford there are Guides,Brownies,Cub-Scouts,Scouts and Adventure Scouts.I go to Youth Club.It is run by Cathy Hoskin.We can play pool for 10p and all the other games are free.Its 25p to get in.We can have a mug of coke for 5p and normal crisps for normal price.We play Table tennis,Hockey,Badminton and many other games which we make up ourselves.It starts at 7.30 and goes on till 9.30 on a Friday night.I like going to Youth Club very much.
